attributes.action: Compulsory financial awareness tests for politicians
attributes.additional_details: Give politicians a thorough test on their first day of of office. MPs would not be allowed to take up office until this test is passed. This test would include knowledge of current fiscal deficit, amount of national debt, current trade deficit, ratio of borrowing to GDP etc. Given that MPS are responsible for spending huge amounts of taxpayers money, they should have deep knowledge of such things
